summary: A handsome sailor is drawn into a vortex of sibling rivalry, murder, and explosive sexuality.
cast: Brad Davis|Franco Nero|Jeanne Moreau|Laurent Malet|Hanno Pöschl|Günther Kaufmann|Burkhard Driest|Roger Fritz|Dieter Schidor|Natja Brunckhorst|Robert van Ackeren|Werner Asam|Isolde Barth|Axel Bauer|Neil Bell|Gilles Gavois|Wolf Gremm|Karl-Heinz von Hassel|Y Sa Lo|Michael McLernon|Frank Ripploh|Karl Scheydt|Vitus Zeplichal|Isa Jank
title: Querelle (Un pacto con el diablo)
